e) Codificar los símbolos de los códigos anteriores según Huffman o Shanon-Fano (a elección)
y reconstruir el archivo (en tres archivos, uno por codificación).
	Arbol Huffman: 
{BAACA=01011101, BBBBA=01100110, BAACB=1100111, BBBBC=00011111, BCCAB=11010010, BAACC=11011010, BCCAA=00101111, BBBBB=110010010, BCCAC=00000111, CCAAC=110111011, CCBCC=0000100, CCAAB=000100101, CCBCB=0100101, CCAAA=101000001, CCBCA=00011101, AACBA=00100010, AACBB=001001111, AACBC=01011010, BBBCB=0001011, BCCBA=1011111, BBAAA=11011011, BBBCA=110111110, BBAAC=0100110, BCCBC=11010110, BBAAB=0011101, BCCBB=10010101, BBBCC=11111010, CCABC=01011001, CCABB=001011010, CCABA=11000010, CCACA=1010100101, AACAA=000100011, AACAB=110010011, AACAC=000001100, BABCA=11000100, BBCBB=00111001, BAAAA=10000101, BABCB=1011010, BABCC=0110100, BAAAB=10000111, BBCBA=1001100, BAAAC=0111111, BBCBC=100100101, CCBAC=0111010, CCBAB=000000, CCCCC=10100010, CBABC=11100111, CCCCB=1001101, CBABB=11000001, CCBAA=1100011, CCCCA=101000010, CBABA=1011100, AABBB=110111100, ABCAA=111010000, ABCAB=111010110, AABBC=111010111, AABBA=110101111, ABCAC=110101011, BBCCA=00110001, BAABA=1010101, BBCCC=01000100, BAABB=10010011, BBBAB=11111011, BAABC=1001000, BBBAA=10101101, BBCCB=11111111, BBBAC=10110000, CCBBC=10110001, CBACC=0101001, CCBBB=10000100, CBACB=1000111, CCBBA=1110010, CBACA=10100110, AACCB=10110010, AABAA=11000101, AABAB=0011011, AACCC=1000001, AACCA=1111000011, AABAC=11000000, BACCA=00011011, BABAA=0011111, BACCB=0111011, BABAB=0011001, BACCC=1110111, BABAC=0001010, CCCAC=000111101, CBBBC=00001100, CCCAB=1010001110, CBBBB=01011000, CAACB=011111011, CCCAA=100101000, CAACC=000011101, CBBBA=0111000, BBCAA=111011000, BABBA=1111100, BABBB=0100000, BBCAC=100101110, BABBC=111011001, BBCAB=00001111, CBAAC=0011010, CCCBC=1000100, CBBCC=0010101, CCCBB=0100001, CBAAB=11100011, CBBCB=0100100, CCCBA=1000101, CBAAA=1101000, CBBCA=000100110, BACAA=110111101, BACAB=0000010, BACAC=101000000, CAAAB=001010010, CABCC=100101101, CBCBC=1100101, CBCBB=01100111, CAAAC=1000011001, CABCA=001010000, CBCBA=011000, CABCB=001011011, CAAAA=10101001100, BACBA=1111001, BACBB=1010111, BACBC=11000011, CBBAC=0100011, CAABC=10000110001, CBCCC=10101100, CBBAB=11111110, CBBAA=000001101, CAABA=01000101, CBCCB=11011100, CAABB=1010001111, CBCCA=110111010, CABAC=000100000,
